textContent:
We've always so close in so many ways
But I'm so many ways so far away 

When we first met you were really easy to talk to, but I hardly got to know you.

You just listened well to my ideas and challenged me. But not to be more of me. Challenged me to accept you. 

And that battle has never stopped. Me, longing for acceptance and being seen.
And you, longing for the same thing too. 

But I've never learned how to accept all of you as you while learning how to accept all of me as me. It's always been messy

When Ben came there wasn't tike anymore to focus on you, or me. There was only creating a sustainable life for all of us. 

So I did what I knew. I got an education and a job. An apparetmwnt nearby and a house.
title: I'm sorry
textContentHtml:
We've always so close in so many ways

But I'm so many ways so far away 


When we first met you were really easy to talk to, but I hardly got to know you.


You just listened well to my ideas and challenged me. But not to be more of me. Challenged me to accept you. 


And that battle has never stopped. Me, longing for acceptance and being seen.

And you, longing for the same thing too. 


But I've never learned how to accept all of you as you while learning how to accept all of me as me. It's always been messy


When Ben came there wasn't tike anymore to focus on you, or me. There was only creating a sustainable life for all of us. 


So I did what I knew. I got an education and a job. An apparetmwnt nearby and a house.
